m_szDocSumamry: Auto trends in 2016: Hybrids, connectivity and airbags everywhere By Stephen Moore Share Some automakers won't be sorry to see 2015 ride off into the sunset. It was a year blighted by the VW and Takata scandals and recalls, and the odd Chinese knockoff, to boot. What's in store for 2016? Here's what we at PlasticsToday foresee. Refined testing regimes The VW NOx emissions scandal has widened to include dodgy CO2 emissions and, consequently, fuel economy data.
